title: DOOM bots of DOOM
body: Went to play DOOM bots and its not a choice on Alpha client, but it is on reg client...Maybe im just blonde and missing it

replies.body: It is not possible to select that game mode in the alpha, its a big disappointment, sorry!

I have the same issue, no where to be found. Also I'm not sure if I'm daft or not, but I couldn't find the "Browse your Shop" card things that Riot is doing for it on the Alpha client. I had to log in to the old one to claim it
They have not implemented rotating game modes into the alpha client. you will just have to switch clients to play doom bots.

> [{quoted}](name=chewbaca68,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=dmEEmHPJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-20T23:38:37.893+0000)
>
> They have not implemented rotating game modes into the alpha client. you will just have to switch clients to play doom bots.

or someone invites u

*edit just realized they removed it, even with invite i cant play anymore, yesterday it worked fine
